description: The HM_TOPIC_EDITS table includes all Health Maintenance topics that have overridden information specific to this patient. For example, a user may specify a frequency to use for a given patient instead of the defaults coming from the Health Maintenance topic or Health Maintenance plan records.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HM_EDIT_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: This item contains all of the Health Maintenance Topics that this patient has edits for. Any edits to a topic for a patient will supersede the automatic defaults from the HMT or HMP record.

columns.name: HM_EDIT_TOPIC_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the health maintenance topic.

columns.name: HM_EDIT_FREQ
columns.description: This item contains the edited frequency for a given Health Maintenance topic for this patient. Any edits to a topic for a patient will supersede the automatic defaults from the HMT or HMP record.

columns.name: HM_EDIT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the reasons for each edited frequency of an HM Topic for this patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HM_EDIT_CMT
columns.description: This item contains comments for each edited frequency of an HM Topic for this patient.

columns.name: HM_EDIT_RECOM_ID
columns.description: This item contains the Recommendation record ID that is driving the associated Health Maintenance Topic patient specific frequency.

columns.name: HM_EDIT_DUE_DATE
columns.description: This item contains the specified due date of the associated Health Maintenance Topic. This due date will supersede any due date calculated from the patient specific frequency.

columns.name: HM_EDIT_MSG_ID
columns.description: This item contains the In Basket message record ID that is driving the associated Health Maintenance topic patient specific frequency.
